alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 05 at 3:37AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Winds Likely Today... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Southwest winds increasing to 25 to 35 mph with gusts to around 50 mph. Occasional gusts to around 60 mph are possible in the more wind prone locations like Wyoming Boulevard and Hat Six Road. Blowing snow is possible at times. * WHERE...The Green and Rattlesnake Mountains and Natrona County. * WHEN...Into this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Drivers should watch for strong crosswinds when driving, especially high profile vehicles and motorists towing lightweight trailers. Brief reductions in visibility from blowing snow are possible.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
